price: 111. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Dib u dhig (xaalkiisa) isaga iyo walaalkiba (in muddo ah)oo u dir ergooyin xagga magaalooyinka.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-arsil fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
